Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Lawndale
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Cicero, into Ford City due to, street blockage at 79th/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Cicero, into Ford City due to, street blockage at 79th/Lawndale.    

Allow extra travel time.
